resources.string:
Next feature release (Beta version):
 · New: Implemented new data storage structure
 · New: Allow moving additional geocache data to external SD
 · New: Extract DMS, DegDec and UTM waypoint coordinates out of personal note
 · New: Export owner name to clipboard by clicking it
 · New: More precise computation of distance, azimuth or projection
 · Fix: Do not parse formulas in personal notes as waypoint coordinates
 · Fix: Remove wrong menu item from trackable logging screen
 · Fix: Apply API key for OSM:Cyclemap
 · Fix: Detect that no language has been selected on geocaching.com
 · Fix: Allow resetting global cache type filter by clicking on filter info in lists
